home.intro1: I am a fullstack developer with 3 years of experience.
home.intro2: I leverage web technologies to build web, mobile and desktop applications.
home.claim: In love with new technologies and creating the best performing user experience
home.bio: Born in Florence on February 5th, 1999, I'm a mission-driven fullstack developer with a passion for collaboration and teaching. I love making side projects in my spare time to solve personal problems and (hopefully) help others. As a web developer, I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail and my mission-driven work ethic to make stuff. Sometimes, I also play music (or I try)

education.sub: From Italy to France (and Sweden for a while)

contact.title: reach out
contact.promise: I'll get in touch ASAP, I promise
